titleStmt.title: The life and death of James commonly called Collonel Turner executed at Lime-street end Ianua[ry] the 21. 1663. for a burglary and fellony committed in the house of Mr. Francis Tryon of Limestreet, Merchant. Licensed and entred.
titleStmt.author: Turner, James, d. 1664.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the originals at the British Library and the Trinity College Library, Cambridge.
